aboutMovie: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind, in a thrilling action-packed tale that delves into the psychological battle between order and chaos. As the Joker unleashes a wave of terror across Gotham City, Batman must confront his own limits, pushing himself to the brink in order to save the city he swore to protect.

Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state, when the mind is at its most vulnerable. Cobb is offered a chance to regain his old life in exchange for one last job: inception, planting an idea in someone's mind.

A high-octane chase through a post-apocalyptic desert where survival is the only rule. Mad Max: Fury Road thrusts viewers into a relentless pursuit filled with roaring engines, explosive action, and larger-than-life characters. In a world where resources are scarce and danger lurks at every turn, Furiosa, a fierce warrior, teams up with the mysterious drifter Max to escape the tyrannical warlord Immortan Joe.

John Wick, a retired hitman, is forced back into the criminal underworld he left behind when a mobster's son takes everything from him. With a relentless drive for vengeance and a reputation that precedes him, Wick embarks on a merciless path of retribution.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

In a dystopian future where reality is simulated by machines to pacify humans, Neo, a computer hacker, discovers the truth and joins a group of rebels to fight against the machine overlords and free humanity from the illusion of the Matrix.
The adventures of a hotel concierge and his protégé.
Two high school friends navigate their final days before college.
A group of friends tries to piece together the events of their wild bachelor party in Las Vegas.

Two middle-aged, spoiled guys become competitive stepbrothers after their single parents marry each other. Their rivalry and antics lead to a series of hilarious mishaps, but eventually, they must come together to save the family business.

Annie, a single woman whose life is a mess, competes with her best friend's new maid of honor to show who is the better friend, leading to a series of mishaps and hilarious situations in preparation for the wedding.

Two underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring. As they navigate the high school scene, they must face their own teenage insecurities while trying to solve the case.
The story of hope and friendship in a prison setting.
A heartwarming story of a man with extraordinary experiences.
The true story of a brilliant but troubled mathematician who struggles with schizophrenia.

In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery. Facing cruelty as well as unexpected kindnesses, Solomon struggles to stay alive and retain his dignity.
In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

movieName: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
aboutMovie: The epic conclusion to the battle for Middle-earth.

movieName: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
aboutMovie: A young wizard begins his magical journey.
Four siblings discover a magical world hidden inside a wardrobe and join the fight against an evil queen.
The Avengers must assemble one last time to undo the damage caused by Thanos in the ultimate battle for the universe.
Tony Stark, a wealthy industrialist, is kidnapped by terrorists and builds a high-tech suit of armor to escape.
Peter Parker seeks the help of Doctor Strange to erase everyone's memory of his secret identity, leading to unintended consequences.
A touching love story that transcends time, based on the Nicholas Sparks novel.
A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love but struggle to maintain their relationship as they chase their dreams in Los Angeles.
A classic tale of love and misunderstanding set in Georgian England.
An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe in true love and a man who does, exploring their relationship's ups and downs.
A timeless romance aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
Two teenagers with cancer fall in love and try to live life to the fullest, despite their circumstances.
